review: Professional explanation on this issue addressed by the friendly doc is amazing.. it reduced the pain quickly.. thanks a ton to  him
Doctor explained the knee replacement surgery briefly. Doctor was friendly. He gave full assurance to the patient.

I had consulted the doctor as I had heel pain. ****** *** **** *** ******** I can definitely recommend doctor to my family or friends. X-ray was suggested and I have plans to go again. There was no waiting time in the hospital.
